Storm service properties

properties.label: zookeeper_session_timeout
properties.description: The session timeout for clients to ZooKeeper

properties.label: zookeeper_connection_timeout
properties.description: The connection timeout for clients to ZooKeeper

properties.label: zookeeper_retry_times
properties.description: The number of times to retry a Zookeeper operation

properties.label: zookeeper_retry_interval
properties.description: The interval between retries of a Zookeeper operation

properties.label: zookeeper_retry_intervalceiling_millis
properties.description: The interval time between retries of a Zookeeper operation

properties.label: nimbus_childopts
properties.description: This parameter is used by the storm-deploy project to configure the jvm options for the nimbus daemon

properties.label: nimbus_task_timeout_secs
properties.description: How long without heartbeating a task can go before nimbus will consider the task dead and reassign it to another location

properties.label: nimbus_supervisor_timeout_secs
properties.description: How long before a supervisor can go without heartbeating before nimbus considers it dead and stops assigning new work to it

properties.label: ui_childopts
properties.description: Childopts for Storm UI Java process

properties.description: Childopts for Storm logviewer Java process

properties.label: drpc_childopts
properties.description: Childopts for Storm drpc Java process

properties.label: pacemaker_childopts
properties.description: Childopts for Storm pacemaker Java process

properties.label: logviewer_max_sum_worker_logs_size_mb
properties.description: The maximum number of bytes all worker log files can take up in MB

properties.label: logviewer_max_per_worker_logs_size_mb
properties.description: The maximum number of bytes per workerâ€™s files can take up in MB

properties.label: topology_workers
properties.description: How many processes should be spawned around the cluster to execute this topology. Each process will execute some number of tasks as threads within them. This parameter should be used in conjunction with the parallelism hints on each component in the topology to tune the performance of a topology

properties.label: topology_eventlogger_executors
properties.description: How many executors to spawn for event logger

properties.label: supervisor_slots_ports
properties.description: A list of ports that can run workers on this supervisor. Each worker uses one port, and the supervisor will only run one worker per port. Use this configuration to tune how many workers run on each machine

properties.label: supervisor_childopts
properties.description: Childopts for Storm supervisor Java process

properties.label: supervisor_worker_start_timeout_secs
properties.description: how long supervisor will wait to ensure that a worker process is started

properties.label: supervisor_worker_timeout_secs
properties.description: how long between heartbeats until supervisor considers that worker dead and tries to restart it

properties.label: supervisor_shutdown_sleep_secs
properties.description: how many seconds to sleep for before shutting down threads on worker

properties.label: supervisor_monitor_frequency_secs
properties.description: how frequently the supervisor checks on the status of the processes it's monitoring and restarts if necessary

properties.label: supervisor_heartbeat_frequency_secs
properties.description: how frequently the supervisor heartbeats to the cluster state (for nimbus)

properties.label: worker_heap_memory_mb
properties.description: The default heap memory size in MB per worker, used in the jvm -Xmx opts for launching the worker

properties.label: worker_childopts
properties.description: The jvm opts provided to workers launched by this supervisor
